name: Nightmare
effect: This move only deals damage if the target is Drowsy, if the target is not Drowsy this move gains -4 Accuracy and is instead treated as a Support move which inflicts the target with Drowsy. Deal 1 Damage to the foe. Deal 1 Damage again at the beginning of each Round if the target is still Drowsy.
description: The user enters the target's dream to torment it.
